settings.about.name: Security Control Center
settings.about.description: Security Control Center is an offline-first workspace for classified document management and incident response. It provides RBAC with per-object ACLs, clearance enforcement, encrypted storage, versioning, approvals, audit trails, and controlled export for regulated environments.

Not required for current TLS mode.
Trusted proxies contain broad CIDR ranges.
